title: Statement by the President and First Lady Congratulating Their Royal Highnesses The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 02, 2015

 



Statement by the President and First Lady Congratulating Their Royal Highnesses The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge




Michelle and I are delighted to congratulate the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge, her Majesty the Queen and the Royal Family, and all the people of the United Kingdom on the birth of the Royal Princess.Â  On behalf of the American people, we wish the Duke and Duchess and their son George much joy and happiness on the occasion of the arrival of the newest member of their family.
